Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 5-2012. A 39-year-old 
man with a recent diagnosis of HIV infection and acute psychosis.
Freudenreich O(1), Basgoz N, Fernandez-Robles C, Larvie M, Misdraji J.

Author information:
(1)Department of Psychiatry, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA.
